data.title: Alittihad news online
data.meta_description: Reach decision-makers at Alittihad News online. Find their phone numbers & email addresses. It’s free. - Lusha
data.text:
Alittihad News Paper From the United Arab Emirates A Local news Paper politics,Sports,Economy, Art and Multimedia Abu Dhabi Media is one of the fastest growing, multi-platform media and entertainment organizations in the Middle East, operating across the broadcast, publishing, and digital media sectors. The company manages over 20 market-leading brands in two categories: brands that serve the UAE through a defined public service role; and brands that target the wider Arab world with clear commercial objectives. The company also has strong commercial aspirations, targeting women and families with brands that reach across the pan-Arab world. These include Abu Dhabi Al Oula TV, leading women’s magazine Zahrat Al Khaleej, and online platform anaZahra.com, as well as a suite of pay TV brands and digital entities such as ADMCSport.com. Abu Dhabi Media owns and operates a number of subsidiaries, including: local film company, Image Nation Abu Dhabi; LIVE, the most advanced outdoor broadcast and production company; and state-of-the-art printing facility, United Printing Press (UPP). In addition, the company partners with Universal Music Group and Sony Music Entertainment on VEVO, the premium online music video platform; and with National Geographic on National Geographic Abu Dhabi, the Arabic language television channel, and National Geographic Al Arabiya magazine.

Read more
